remarks: Group division by an inverse.  (Contributed by NM, 15-Feb-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpdiv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpdiv.2 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpdiv.3 $e |- D = ( /g ` G ) $.
grpodivinv $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D ( N ` B ) ) = ( A G B ) ) $.
